channel.title: db on Developer Playground
channel.description: Recent content in db on Developer Playground

item.title: Using Docker-compose for local development environment
item.description: Create network docker network create -d bridge dev-net Build environment docker-compose.yaml networks: network1: name: dev-net services: db: image: mariadb:10.3 container_name: dev-db volumes: - /d/data/dev/mariadb/data:/var/lib/mysql - /d/data/dev/mariadb/conf.d:/etc/mysql/conf.d environment: - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=devplayg12!
